Key Match Events: Bradley Beal scored 25 points off the bench, including 20 in the second half, to help the Suns end a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 win over the Sixers.
Adding Beal and Nurkić to the reserves allowed the Suns' bench to outscore the Sixers' bench 54-7 in the comeback victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Beal expressed surprise at being benched, stating he had no prior indication and emphasized he would not be a distraction.
Head coach Mike Budenholzer explained the decision to bench Beal and Jusuf Nurkić was made to shake things up after a four-game losing streak.
Beal mentioned that he needs to be addressed regarding any potential trade, as he holds a no-trade clause in his contract.
